frame.name: Food_gathering
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fex name="Gatherer">Gatherer</fex> removes <fex name="Crop">Crop</fex> ripe and ready to an accepted degree. The <fex name="Crop">Crop</fex> comes from a <fex name="Source">Source</fex> where it has been grown and matured.
<ex><fex name="Gatherer">They</fex> <t>harvest</t> <fex name="Crop">their pumpkins</fex> <fex name="Time">in the Autumn</fex>. <fex name="Source">INI</fex> </ex>
<ex><fex name="Gatherer">We</fex> <t>bring in</t> <fex name="Crop">the tobacco</fex> <fex name="Source">from the fields</fex> <fex name="Time">during the summer</fex>.</ex>
<ex>The stage at which <fex name="Crop">the peppercorns</fex> are <t>harvested</t> <fex name="Source">from the vine</fex> decides their colour . <fex name="Gatherer">CNI</fex></ex></def-root>

FE.name: Gatherer
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Gatherer</fen> is the agent gathering the <fen>Crop</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Gatherer">Small growers</fex> can <t>harvest</t> quality crops.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Crop
FE.definition:
<def-root><fen>Crop</fen> is item being collected together by the <fen>Gatherer</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Crop">Tubers</fex> <t>harvested</t> immediately after spraying developed gangrene.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Duration
FE.definition:
<def-root>For what length of time the <fen>Gatherer</fen> was gathering the <fen>Crop</fen>.
</def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Means</fen> by which the <fen>Crop</fen> is gathered.</def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>The greater geographic location where the <fen>Gatherer</fen> gathers his <fen>Crop</fen>. </def-root>

FE.name: Purpose
FE.definition: <def-root>An action that the <fen>Gatherer</fen> intends to accomplish by gathering his <fen>Crop</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Particular_iteration
FE.definition: <def-root>Expressions marked with this extra-thematic FE modify a non-iterative use of the target, and indicate that it is conceived as embedded within an iterated series of similar events or states.</def-root>

FE.name: Source
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fex name="Source">Source</fex> is the ground where the <fex name="Crop">Crop</fex> is gathered from.
<ex>They picked the apples <fex name="Source">from the tallest trees</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Circumstances
FE.definition: <def-root>Circumstances describe the state of the world (at a particular time and place) which is specifically independent of the event itself and any of its participants. </def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE describes the amount of effort put into the food gathering event.</def-root>

FE.name: Beneficiary
FE.definition: <def-root>The person on who's behalf the <fen>Gatherer</fen> gathers the <fen>Crop</fen>.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: gather.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: retrieve and bring together crops

lexUnit.name: bring in.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: remove and amass ready crops from where they grow
